title.rendered: Match officials for T20 World Cup 2022 final announced

content.rendered:
The final of the T20 World Cup 2022 will take place on Sunday, and the ICC confirmed the match officials on Friday. The final between England and Pakistan will be officiated by umpires Marais Erasmus and Kumar Dharmasena. The TV umpire will be Chris Gaffaney, while the fourth umpire will be Paul Reiffel. The match referee will be Ranjan Madugalle.

Read more: Kohli shares video recorded by fan in his hotel room, says ‘Not okay with this invasion of privacy
